Radical 009: 人

人

人 (Skt. ; Pali ) n. man, human, person, people, referring to humans in general. This general term can be nuanced in translation based on context.
Usage: 佛在拘薩羅國人間遊行
"the Buddha was in Kauśala touring among the people"
cf. DA 29.1

佛

佛 (Skt. buddha; Pali buddha) pn. the Buddha, referring to Gautama.
Usage: 佛在拘薩羅國人間遊行
"the Buddha was in Kauśala touring among the people"
cf. DA passim.
